sentences.sContent: Remote Accelerator is aimed at single users, and has many features aimed at the telecommuter.
sentences.sContent_eng: Remote Accelerator is aimed at single users, and has many features aimed at the telecommuter.
sentences.sCn: 远程加速器定位于独立用户，针对远程工作人员提供了许多功能。

trans.tranOther: someone who works at home using a computer connected to a company’s main office
